full_text: Knitted jacket in DROPS Alaska or DROPS Nepal. Piece is knitted top down with raglan, cables, relief pattern and double neck edge. Size XS – XXXL. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ #irelandmagiccardigan DROPS design: Pattern x-515 Yarn group C or A + A SIZE : XS - S - M - L - XL - XXL - XXXL YARN : DROPS ALASKA from Garnstudio (belongs to yarn group C) 950-1050-1150-1300-1400-1550-1700 g colour 02, Off White Or use: DROPS NEPAL from Garnstudio (belongs to yarn group C) 900-1000-1100-1200-1300-1450-1600 g colour 0100, Off White BUTTONS : DROPS BUTTON NO 511: 6-6-7-7-7-8-8 pieces NEEDLES : DROPS CIRCULAR NEEDLE SIZE 5 mm: Length 40 and 80 cm. DROPS CIRCULAR NEEDLE SIZE 3.5 mm: 40 cm DROPS CIRCULAR NEEDLE SIZE 4 mm: Length: 80 cm. DROPS DOUBLE POINTED NEEDLES SIZE 5 mm. DROPS DOUBLE POINTED NEEDLES SIZE 4 mm. DROPS CABLE NEEDLE. The technique MAGIC LOOP can be used – you then only need circular needle of 80 cm in each size. KNITTING TENSION : 17 stitches in width and 22 rows vertically in stocking stitch on needle size 5 mm = 10 x 10 cm. NOTE! Remember that needle size is only a suggestion. If you have too many stitches on 10 cm switch to larger needles. If you have too few stitches on 10 cm switch to smaller needles.
name: Ravelry: 260-3 Ireland Magic Cardigan pattern by DROPS design
